Tool

NamePolygon Parts to Separate Polygons
ID10
AuthorO.Conrad (c) 2011

Description

Splits parts of multipart polygons into separate polygons. This can be done only for islands (outer rings) or for all parts (inner and outer rings) by checking the 'ignore lakes' option.

Parameters

NameTypeIdentifierDescriptionConstraints
Input
Polygons Shapes (input)POLYGONS
Output
Polygon PartsShapes (output)PARTS
Options
Ignore LakesBooleanLAKESDefault: 0
